Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: Layered 1-D soil temperature component based on Campbell (1985). The soil is represented by nodes at the air (0), surface (1), layer centres (2..N), and several phantom nodes below the profile to enforce a constant-temperature lower boundary. At sub-daily steps it computes net radiation, atmospheric boundary-layer conductance (stability-corrected, wind- and canopy-dependent), and solves the tridiagonal heat-flow system via the Thomas algorithm. Volumetric heat capacity and thermal conductivity are derived from layer thickness, bulk density, texture (sand/silt/clay), organic carbon, rocks, and soil water. Outputs include daily min/mean/max temperatures for each layer and surface, and profiles of heat capacity, thermal conductivity, and heat storage.
Description.ShortDescription: Simulates soil and surface temperature dynamics over a layered soil profile using a finite-difference heat flow model with atmospheric boundary coupling.

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thicknesses

Input.name: physical_BD
Input.description: Soil bulk density per layer

Input.name: physical_Rocks
Input.description: Rock content per layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
Input.description: Sand fraction per layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
Input.description: Silt fraction per layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
Input.description: Clay fraction per layer

Input.name: organic_Carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon content per layer

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content per layer

Input.name: waterBalance_Salb
Input.description: Soil albedo

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Annual average air temperature

Input.name: weather_MeanT
Input.description: Daily mean air temperature

Input.name: weather_MaxT
Input.description: Daily maximum air temperature

Input.name: weather_MinT
Input.description: Daily minimum air temperature

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily global solar radiation

Input.name: weather_AirPressure
Input.description: Air pressure

Input.name: weather_Latitude
Input.description: Site latitude

Input.name: weather_Wind
Input.description: Wind speed at instrument height

Input.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
Input.description: Day of year

Input.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial temperatures by layer (top to bottom)

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth below which temperature is constant

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Measurement instrument height

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Potential soil evaporation through canopy

Input.name: waterBalance_Es
Input.description: Soil evaporation (actual)

Input.name: waterBalance_Eo
Input.description: Potential evapotranspiration (reference)

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Total number of soil nodes (layers + phantom nodes)

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of physical soil layers

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Depth of nodes including air and phantom nodes

Input.name: thermCondPar1
Input.description: Thermal conductivity coefficient 1 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar2
Input.description: Thermal conductivity coefficient 2 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar3
Input.description: Thermal conductivity coefficient 3 per element

Input.name: thermCondPar4
Input.description: Thermal conductivity coefficient 4 per element

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Layer thickness array including phantom nodes

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rock fraction per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand fraction per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt fraction per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay fraction per element including phantom nodes

Input.name: ps
Input.description: Particle density constant

Input.name: pom
Input.description: Organic matter particle density constant

Input.name: soilRoughnessHeight
Input.description: Bare soil roughness height

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument height used in boundary-layer conductance

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Boundary-layer conductance source selector (calc or constant)

Input.name: netRadiationSource
Input.description: Net radiation source selector (calc or eos)

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Default time of daily maximum air temperature (24h clock)

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature profile by node (includes air node and phantom nodes)

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature profile captured at early morning

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Working array for newly solved temperatures by node

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Interpolated air temperature for current sub-daily timestep

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Node-based volumetric soil water content (includes phantom nodes)

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Thermal conductivity by node (includes air node index at 0)

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: Element thermal conductance values (includes air and bottom boundary indices)

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Element heat storage term by node

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Accumulated boundary-layer conductance over the day

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily average soil temperature by node (running mean)

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation to soil for current sub-daily timestep

Input.name: timeOfDaySecs
Input.description: Current sub-daily time within day

Input.name: internalTimeStep
Input.description: Internal numerical timestep for sub-daily integration

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Maximum air temperature of previous day

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Minimum air temperature of previous day

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Updated soil temperature profile by node

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperature profile captured at early morning

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Interpolated air temperature for current sub-daily timestep

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated volumetric soil water content by node

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Thermal conductivity by node (including air node index at 0)

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Element heat storage term by node

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Accumulated boundary-layer conductance over the day

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily average soil temperature by node

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation to soil for current timestep

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Updated maximum air temperature of previous day

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Updated minimum air temperature of previous day

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division returning fallback on zero denominator

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if array contains any valid non-sentinel, non-NaN values

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sums values over an index range, skipping sentinel values

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Fills an array with zeros

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Computes cumulative thickness from individual layer thicknesses

Function.name: boundCheck
Function.description: Placeholder bounds check (no-op)

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan-Boltzmann law

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns volumetric specific heat constant for a named constituent

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Fraction of rocks by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Fraction of organic matter by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Fraction of sand by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Fraction of silt by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Fraction of clay by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Fraction of water by volume

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Fraction of ice by volume (here zero)

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Fraction of air by volume as residual

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns constituent thermal property (currently returns volumetricSpecificHeat due to implementation)

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Returns shape factor for constituents (currently returns volumetricSpecificHeat due to implementation)

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps layer-based values to node-based values via linear weighting

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes thermal conductivity coefficients from bulk density

Function.name: clamp_sqrt
Function.description: Safe square root with clamp at zero

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Initial surface temperature from albedo, mean and max temperature, and radiation

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Computes initial soil temperature profile from annual wave

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Interpolates sub-daily air temperature

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat of soil and maps to nodes

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes thermal conductivity of soil and maps to nodes

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Implicit tridiagonal solver for heat diffusion with surface flux boundary conditions

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Updates state temperatures and daily min/max/avg; accumulates boundary-layer conductance

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Computes boundary-layer conductance using Monin-Obukhov similarity

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes sub-daily partitioning of daily solar radiation and cloud factor

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes net radiation to soil per sub-daily step (shortwave + longwave)
